function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Violation of lockdown measures leading to increased building occupancy","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the building","Mitigation":"Enforce strict lockdown measures and monitor building occupancy","Technologies":"Access control systems, occupancy monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate reporting of building occupancy during the pandemic","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous data collection and verification processes","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, digital check-in systems","People":"Building staff, data collectors","Owner":"Building management, research team"},{"Description":"Lack of safety protocols for in-situ visits to buildings during the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases for visitors and building occupants","Mitigation":"Establish and enforce strict safety protocols for in-situ visits","Technologies":"Contactless temperature screening, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Visitors, building occupants, research team","Owner":"Building management, research team"}]}
